document_data.name: Otipolano
document_data.mainbody: '''Otipolano''' was a clown in [[Mitzlato]] in the [[Pasocada Basin]] in [[Maztica]].
document_data.History: In [[1362 DR]], Otipolano was at the welcoming party for [[Sozarro]]'s expedition as observer.
